spell_tooltip.description: Your Consecration clears and suppresses all snare effects on allies within its area of effect.
Lightbearer's healing transfer is increased by up to 150% based on your current health. Lower health heals allies for more.

Heals a friendly target for an amount equal to 100% your maximum health.

Cannot be used on a target with Forbearance. Causes Forbearance for 30 sec.

Learn Concentration Aura, Devotion Aura, and Crusader Aura:

Concentration Aura:
Interrupt and Silence effects on party and raid members within 40 yds are 30% shorter. 

 Devotion Aura:
Party and raid members within 40 yds are bolstered by their devotion, reducing damage taken by 3%.

 Crusader Aura:
Increases mounted speed by 20% for all party and raid members within 40 yds.

Hurls a divine hammer that strikes an enemy for 287,336 Holy damage. Only usable on enemies that have less than 20% health, or during Avenging Wrath.

Generates 1 Holy Power.
Cleanses a friendly target, removing all Poison and Disease effects.
Hammer of Justice's cooldown is reduced by 15 sec.
Emits dazzling light in all directions, blinding enemies within 10 yds, causing them to wander disoriented for 6 sec. Damage may cancel the effect.
Leap atop your Charger for 7 sec, increasing movement speed by 100%. Usable while indoors or in combat.

Judgment causes the target to take 40% increased damage from your next Holy Power ability.

Multiple applications may overlap.
Divine Steed now has 2 charges.
Blesses a party or raid member, granting immunity to movement impairing effects for 8 sec.
Interrupts spellcasting and prevents any spell in that school from being cast for 3 sec.

Instantly cast Avenger's Shield on up to 5 targets within 30 yds.

Generates 1 Holy Power per target hit.
Blessing of Freedom increases movement speed by 30%, and you gain Blessing of Freedom when cast on a friendly target.
Armor increased by 20%, Stamina increased by 20% and damage taken from area of effect attacks reduced by 12%.
Successfully interrupting an enemy with Rebuke or Avenger's Shield casts an extra Blessed Hammer.

Blesses a party or raid member, reducing their damage taken by 30%, but you suffer 100% of damage prevented.

Last 12 sec, or until transferred damage would cause you to fall below 20% health.
After casting Divine Toll, you instantly cast Avenger's Shield every 5 sec for 15 sec.

Blesses a party or raid member, granting immunity to Physical damage and harmful effects for 10 sec.

Cannot be used on a target with Forbearance. Causes Forbearance for 30 sec.

Shares a cooldown with Blessing of Spellwarding.
Your Consecration is 15% larger, and enemies within it have 50% reduced movement speed.
Armor and critical strike chance increased by 4%.
Reduces the cooldown of Blessing of Sacrifice by 60 sec.
Holy Power spending abilities have a 15% chance to make your next Holy Power spending ability free and deal 15% increased damage and healing.
Reduces the cooldown of your Divine Shield, Ardent Defender, and Lay on Hands by 30%.
Shield of the Righteous heals you and up to 2 nearby allies for 1.0% of maximum health.
Blessing of Sacrifice now removes and prevents all Poison and Disease effects.
Ardent Defender increases healing taken by 15% for its duration.
Shield of the Righteous grants 5% bonus armor for 4.5 sec.
Mastery increased by 4% and strength increased by 4%.
Hammer of Wrath and Judgment deal 10% additional damage and extend the duration of Avenging Wrath by 0.5 sec.

When you cast 3 Holy Power generating abilities, you gain Blessing of Dawn. When you consume Blessing of Dawn, you gain Blessing of Dusk.

Blessing of Dawn
Your next Holy Power spending ability deals 30% additional increased damage and healing. This effect stacks.

Blessing of Dusk
Damage taken reduced by 4% For 10 sec.

Removing harmful effects with Divine Shield heals you for 10% for each effect removed.  This heal cannot exceed 30% of your maximum health.

Divine Shield may now be cast while Forbearance is active.

Hurls your shield at an enemy target, dealing 108,245 Holy damage, interrupting and silencing the non-Player target for 3 sec, and then jumping to 4 additional nearby enemies. 

Shields you for 8 sec, absorbing 60% as much damage as it dealt.
Your block chance is increased by 20%, you are able to block spells, and your successful blocks deal 16,156 Holy damage to your attacker.

Throws a Blessed Hammer that spirals outward, dealing 23,189 Holy damage to enemies and reducing the next damage they deal to you by 27,383.

Generates 1 Holy Power.
Shield of the Righteous increases your Strength and Stamina by 2% for 10 sec, stacking up to 3.

When you avoid a melee attack or use Blessed Hammer, you have a 15% chance to reset the remaining cooldown on Avenger's Shield.

Reduces the cooldown of Judgment by 3 sec.
Every 3 Shields of the Righteous make your next Word of Glory cost no Holy Power. Maximum 2 stacks.
Your chance to block spells is increased by 8%.

Reduces all damage you take by 20% for 8 sec.

While Ardent Defender is active, the next attack that would otherwise kill you will instead bring you to 20% of your maximum health.
When you use Avenger's Shield, your block chance is increased by 10% for 10 sec.
Consecration's benefits persist for 4.0 seconds after you leave it.
Enemies struck by Avenger's Shield burn with holy fire, suffering 109,661 Radiant damage over 5 sec.
Avenger's Shield also shields you for 8 sec, absorbing 60% as much damage as it dealt, up to 50% of your maximum health.

Blesses a party or raid member, granting immunity to magical damage and harmful effects for 10 sec.

Cannot be used on a target with Forbearance. Causes Forbearance for 30 sec.

Shares a cooldown with Blessing of Protection.
Lay on Hands' cooldown is reduced by 1.0 sec per Holy Power spent.
Consecration lasts 2 sec longer and its damage is increased by 20%.
Spending Holy Power grants you 1% haste per finisher for 12 sec, stacking up to 3 times.

Call upon the Light to become an avatar of retribution, causing Judgment to generate 1 additional Holy Power, allowing Hammer of Wrath to be used on any target, increasing your damage, healing, and critical strike chance by 20% for 25 sec.
Avenger's Shield jumps to 2 additional targets.
Empowers you with the spirit of ancient kings, reducing all damage you take by 50% for 8 sec.
Judgment now has 2 charges, and Grand Crusader now also reduces the cooldown of Judgment by 3 sec.

Each enemy hit by Avenger's Shield reduces the remaining cooldown on Guardian of Ancient Kings by 1.0 sec.

When you drop below 30% health, you become infused with Guardian of Ancient Kings for 4 sec. This cannot occur again for 45 sec.
Avenging Wrath and Sentinel cause Judgment to generate 1 additional Holy Power, and have 25% increased duration.
Your Lay on Hands, Divine Shield, Blessing of Protection, and Blessing of Spellwarding have 15% reduced cooldown.
For each target hit by Avenger's Shield, gain 3% parry for 15 sec.
Releases a blinding flash from your shield, causing 365,580 Holy damage to all nearby enemies within 8 yds and reducing all damage they deal to you by 25% for 6 sec.
Each 3 Holy Power you spend reduces the cooldown of Ardent Defender and Divine Shield by 2.0 sec.
Eye of Tyr deals 300% increased damage and has 33% reduced cooldown.
During Divine Shield, all targets within 15 yds are taunted.
Holy Power abilities reduce the remaining cooldown on Avenging Wrath and Guardian of Ancient Kings by 1.5 sec.

Eye of Tyr is replaced with Hammer of Light for 20 sec after it is cast.

 Hammer of Light:
Hammer down your enemy with the power of the Light, dealing 815,004 Holy damage and 413,700 Holy damage up to 4 nearby enemies. 

Additionally, calls down Empyrean Hammers from the sky to strike 3 nearby enemies for 66,855 Holy damage each.

Costs 5 Holy Power.
Hammer of Light instantly calls down 2 Empyrean Hammers on your target when it is cast.
After casting Hammer of Light, you call down an Empyrean Hammer on a nearby target every 2 sec, for 8 sec.

When Empyrean Hammer critically strikes, 100% of its damage is dealt to nearby enemies.

Enemies hit by this effect deal 5% reduced damage to you for 8 sec.

Eye of Tyr surrounds you with a Holy barrier for 15% of your maximum health.

Hammer of Light heals you for 15% of your maximum health, increased by 2% for each additional target hit. Any overhealing done with this effect gets converted into a Holy barrier instead.
Crusader Strike, Hammer of Wrath and Judgment extend the duration of Shake the Heavens by 1 sec.
Divine Steed lasts 2 sec longer and increases your movement speed by an additional 30% for the first 3 sec.

Casting Judgment increases the damage of Empyrean Hammer by 10% for 10 sec.

Multiple applications may overlap.

Shield of the Righteous and Word of Glory calls down an Empyrean Hammer on a nearby enemy.

While Shake the Heavens is active, this effect calls down an additional Empyrean Hammer.

Hammer of Light grants Shield of the Righteous, erupts a Consecration beneath its target, and increases your Haste by 12% for 6 sec.

Additionally, Eye of Tyr grants 3 Holy Power.

You gain a stack of Light's Deliverance when you call down an Empyrean Hammer.

While Eye of Tyr and Hammer of Light are unavailable, you consume 60 stacks of Light's Deliverance, empowering yourself to cast Hammer of Light an additional time for free.

Heals a friendly target for an amount equal to 100% your maximum health.

Cannot be used on a target with Forbearance. Causes Forbearance for 30 sec.

Learn Concentration Aura, Devotion Aura, and Crusader Aura:

Concentration Aura:
Interrupt and Silence effects on party and raid members within 40 yds are 30% shorter. 

 Devotion Aura:
Party and raid members within 40 yds are bolstered by their devotion, reducing damage taken by 3%.

 Crusader Aura:
Increases mounted speed by 20% for all party and raid members within 40 yds.

Hurls a divine hammer that strikes an enemy for 284,784 Holy damage. Only usable on enemies that have less than 20% health, or during Avenging Wrath.

Generates 1 Holy Power.
Cleanses a friendly target, removing all Poison and Disease effects.
Lay on Hands grants the target 30% increased armor for 8 sec and now ignores healing reduction effects.
Emits dazzling light in all directions, blinding enemies within 10 yds, causing them to wander disoriented for 6 sec. Damage may cancel the effect.

Blessing of Dawn
Your next Holy Power spending ability deals 30% additional increased damage and healing. This effect stacks.

Blessing of Dusk

Call upon the Light to become an avatar of retribution, causing Judgment to generate 1 additional Holy Power, allowing Hammer of Wrath to be used on any target, increasing your damage, healing, and critical strike chance by 20% for 25 sec.
Casting Word of Glory grants you an additional 30% block chance for 6 sec.
Avenger's Shield jumps to 2 additional targets.
Empowers you with the spirit of ancient kings, reducing all damage you take by 50% for 8 sec.
Judgment now has 2 charges, and Grand Crusader now also reduces the cooldown of Judgment by 3 sec.

Each enemy hit by Avenger's Shield reduces the remaining cooldown on Guardian of Ancient Kings by 1.0 sec.

When you drop below 30% health, you become infused with Guardian of Ancient Kings for 4 sec. This cannot occur again for 45 sec.
Avenging Wrath and Sentinel cause Judgment to generate 1 additional Holy Power, and have 25% increased duration.
Your Lay on Hands, Divine Shield, Blessing of Protection, and Blessing of Spellwarding have 15% reduced cooldown.

Releases a blinding flash from your shield, causing 365,580 Holy damage to all nearby enemies within 8 yds and reducing all damage they deal to you by 25% for 6 sec.
Each 3 Holy Power you spend reduces the cooldown of Ardent Defender and Divine Shield by 2.0 sec.
Avenger's Shield increases the damage of your next Shield of the Righteous by 20% for each target hit by Avenger's Shield, stacking up to 5 times, and increases its radius by 6 yds.
During Divine Shield, all targets within 15 yds are taunted.
Holy Power abilities reduce the remaining cooldown on Avenging Wrath and Guardian of Ancient Kings by 1.5 sec.

Imbue your weapon with the power of the Light, increasing your armor by 5% and your primary stat by 2%.

Lasts 1 hour.

If you bestow an Armament upon an ally, you also gain its benefits.

If you bestow an Armament upon yourself, a nearby ally also gains its benefits.
For each Holy Power ability cast, your next Consecration deals 343,840 damage or healing immediately, split across all enemies and allies.
When an Armament fades from you, the cooldown of Lay on Hands is reduced by 15.0 sec and you gain Shining Light.
Your spells and abilities have a chance to manifest a Holy Armament for a nearby ally.

When you or an ally wielding a Holy Bulwark are healed above maximum health, transfer 100% of the overhealing to your ally.

When you or an ally wielding a Sacred Weapon drop below 40% health, redistribute your health immediately and every 1 sec for 4 sec. May only occur once per cast.
The effect of your active Aura is increased by 33% on targets with your Armaments.
Consuming Shining Light reduces the cooldown of Holy Armaments by 3.0 sec.
Judgment critical strikes cause a shockwave around the target, dealing 212,771 damage at the target's location.
Avenging Wrath summons an additional Sacred Weapon, and during Avenging Wrath your Sacred Weapon casts spells on your target and echoes the effects of your Holy Power abilities.

Heals a friendly target for an amount equal to 100% your maximum health.

Cannot be used on a target with Forbearance. Causes Forbearance for 30 sec.

Concentration Aura:

 Devotion Aura:
Party and raid members within 40 yds are bolstered by their devotion, reducing damage taken by 3%.

 Crusader Aura:
Increases mounted speed by 20% for all party and raid members within 40 yds.

Generates 1 Holy Power.
Lay on Hands grants the target 30% increased armor for 8 sec and now ignores healing reduction effects.
After you spend 20 Holy Power, your next Word of Glory echoes onto a nearby ally at 30% effectiveness.

Divine Steed reduces the cooldown of 4 nearby ally's major movement ability by 3.0 sec.

While Ardent Defender is active, the next attack that would otherwise kill you will instead bring you to 20% of your maximum health.
When you use Avenger's Shield, your block chance is increased by 10% for 10 sec.
Consecration's benefits persist for 4.0 seconds after you leave it.
Enemies struck by Avenger's Shield burn with holy fire, suffering 109,661 Radiant damage over 5 sec.
Avenger's Shield also shields you for 8 sec, absorbing 60% as much damage as it dealt, up to 50% of your maximum health.

Blesses a party or raid member, granting immunity to magical damage and harmful effects for 10 sec.

Cannot be used on a target with Forbearance. Causes Forbearance for 30 sec.

Shares a cooldown with Blessing of Protection.
Lay on Hands' cooldown is reduced by 1.0 sec per Holy Power spent.
Consecration lasts 2 sec longer and its damage is increased by 20%.
Spending Holy Power grants you 1% haste per finisher for 12 sec, stacking up to 3 times.

Call upon the Light to become an avatar of retribution, causing Judgment to generate 1 additional Holy Power, allowing Hammer of Wrath to be used on any target, increasing your damage, healing, and critical strike chance by 20% for 25 sec.
Avenger's Shield jumps to 2 additional targets.
Empowers you with the spirit of ancient kings, reducing all damage you take by 50% for 8 sec.
Judgment now has 2 charges, and Grand Crusader now also reduces the cooldown of Judgment by 3 sec.

Each enemy hit by Avenger's Shield reduces the remaining cooldown on Guardian of Ancient Kings by 1.0 sec.

When you drop below 30% health, you become infused with Guardian of Ancient Kings for 4 sec. This cannot occur again for 45 sec.
Avenging Wrath and Sentinel cause Judgment to generate 1 additional Holy Power, and have 25% increased duration.
Your Lay on Hands, Divine Shield, Blessing of Protection, and Blessing of Spellwarding have 15% reduced cooldown.
For each target hit by Avenger's Shield, gain 3% parry for 15 sec.
Releases a blinding flash from your shield, causing 365,580 Holy damage to all nearby enemies within 8 yds and reducing all damage they deal to you by 25% for 6 sec.
Each 3 Holy Power you spend reduces the cooldown of Ardent Defender and Divine Shield by 2.0 sec.
Eye of Tyr deals 300% increased damage and has 33% reduced cooldown.
During Divine Shield, all targets within 15 yds are taunted.
Holy Power abilities reduce the remaining cooldown on Avenging Wrath and Guardian of Ancient Kings by 1.5 sec.
Hammer of Light instantly calls down 2 Empyrean Hammers on your target when it is cast.
After casting Hammer of Light, you call down an Empyrean Hammer on a nearby target every 2 sec, for 8 sec.

When Empyrean Hammer critically strikes, 100% of its damage is dealt to nearby enemies.

Enemies hit by this effect deal 5% reduced damage to you for 8 sec.

Eye of Tyr surrounds you with a Holy barrier for 15% of your maximum health.

Hammer of Light heals you for 15% of your maximum health, increased by 2% for each additional target hit. Any overhealing done with this effect gets converted into a Holy barrier instead.
Crusader Strike, Hammer of Wrath and Judgment extend the duration of Shake the Heavens by 1 sec.
Divine Steed lasts 2 sec longer and increases your movement speed by an additional 30% for the first 3 sec.

Casting Judgment increases the damage of Empyrean Hammer by 10% for 10 sec.

Multiple applications may overlap.

Shield of the Righteous and Word of Glory calls down an Empyrean Hammer on a nearby enemy.

While Shake the Heavens is active, this effect calls down an additional Empyrean Hammer.

Hammer of Light grants Shield of the Righteous, erupts a Consecration beneath its target, and increases your Haste by 12% for 6 sec.

Additionally, Eye of Tyr grants 3 Holy Power.

You gain a stack of Light's Deliverance when you call down an Empyrean Hammer.

While Eye of Tyr and Hammer of Light are unavailable, you consume 60 stacks of Light's Deliverance, empowering yourself to cast Hammer of Light an additional time for free.
